description: A mysterious astrologer from Mondstadt, Mona is a powerful Hydro catalyst user who excels at supporting her team with strong buffs and devastating Burst damage.

weapons.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds

artifacts.name: Noblesse Oblige (2) + Emblem of Severed Fate (2)

info: Mona is a Hydro support and Burst DPS who excels at enabling powerful Elemental Reactions and boosting team damage with her Burst. Build her for Energy Recharge, Hydro DMG Bonus, and CRIT stats.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Ripple of Fate
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack
Gathering the might of Hydro, Mona plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all enemies in her path and dealing AoE Hydro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Mirror Reflection of Doom
skills.desc: Creates an illusory Phantom of fate that taunts nearby enemies and deals continuous Hydro DMG. The Phantom explodes at the end of its duration, dealing AoE Hydro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Mirror Reflection of Doom
Creates a Phantom that taunts enemies and deals continuous Hydro DMG. Explodes at the end, dealing AoE Hydro DMG.

skills.name: Stellaris Phantasm
skills.desc: Mona summons the sparkling waves and creates an illusory bubble that imprisons enemies, applies the Omen debuff (increasing DMG taken), and deals massive Hydro DMG when the bubble bursts.
skills.details_html:
Stellaris Phantasm
Applies an Omen to enemies, increasing the DMG they take, and deals massive Hydro DMG when the bubble bursts.

passive_talents.name: Come 'n' Get Me, Hag!
passive_talents.desc: After she sprints using the Illusory Torrent, Mona gains a 15% Hydro DMG Bonus for 8s.

passive_talents.name: Waterborne Destiny
passive_talents.desc: Increases Mona's Hydro DMG Bonus by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.

passive_talents.name: Principium of Astrology
passive_talents.desc: Refunds 25% of the materials used when crafting Weapon Ascension Materials.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Submersion
constellations.desc: The effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for party members under the effect of Omen.

constellations.name: Lunar Chain
constellations.desc: When a Normal Attack hits, Mona has a 20% chance to automatically perform a Charged Attack.

constellations.name: Restless Revolution
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Stellaris Phantasm by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Prophecy of Oblivion
constellations.desc: When any party member attacks an enemy affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Mockery of Fortuna
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Mirror Reflection of Doom by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rhetorics of Calamitas
constellations.desc: Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement, up to 180%.
